QuestData.Title: Culling the Furbolg Threat
QuestData.Description: Directly to the north of Astranaar are the Thistlefur furbolg. My scouts report that their numbers have grown greatly over the past few months. If they grow too great, they may find the courage to attack Astranaar directly!$B$BGo to Thistlefur Village and kill as many of their kind as you can.$B$BI shall remain here in Astranaar and await word from you. Elune be with you, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay any 15 furbolg at Thistlefur Village in Ashenvale.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n.$B$BWe are under constant threat from the furbolg. Hopefully this will keep them at bay for a bit longer.
